name: Memrise Thai superscripts display bugfix
description: fixes the superscript display issue on characters, albeit creates a new (smaller) issue with the audio icon being 3/4s hidden but still visible. A mere 3 lines of CSS
additional_info: version .00001, recommend me improvements and i may make them if i am aware of your suggestions. Otherwise I will never look at this again as it's only purpose in creation was to make those damn superscripts visible for my thai learning
